title: Frequently Asked Questions - GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum

faqs.q: How should I use GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faqs.a: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

faqs.q: Is this safe for sensitive skin?
faqs.a: Note: Mild tingling for sensitive skin

faqs.q: What is the concentration of Vitamin C?
What type of product is this?
faqs.a: This is a 10% Vitamin C serum.

faqs.q: When is the best time to apply?
faqs.a: Morning is recommended suitable for its brightening effects.

faqs.q: Can I use it with sunscreen?
faqs.a: Yes, it should be applied before sunscreen.

faqs.q: How many drops do I need?
faqs.a: 2-3 drops are sufficient for the full face.
Yes, one of the key benefits is brightening.

faqs.q: Does this help with fades dark spots?
faqs.a: Yes, one of the key benefits is fades dark spots.
Yes, Vitamin C is a key ingredient.

faqs.q: What is the role of Vitamin C?

faqs.a: Yes, Hyaluronic Acid is a key ingredient.

faqs.q: What is the role of Hyaluronic Acid?
Is it suitable for daily use?
faqs.a: Yes, it can be used daily.
Side effects are minimal: Mild tingling for sensitive skin
At ₹699 for 10% Vitamin C, it offers competitive value.

faqs.q: Is it good for Oily skin?
faqs.a: Yes, it is specifically formulated for it.

faqs.q: Is it good for Combination skin?
faqs.a: Yes, it is specifically formulated for it.
